plot: The plight of a common thief is complicated when he hides out with a country family that mistakes him for the new preacher in town. The mistaken identity transforms the perpetrator in ways he did not expect.
title: Bird in a Cage
plot_es: The plight of a common thief is complicated when he hides out with a country family that mistakes him for the new preacher in town. The mistaken identity transforms the perpetrator in ways he did not expect.
plot_en: The plight of a common thief is complicated when he hides out with a country family that mistakes him for the new preacher in town. The mistaken identity transforms the perpetrator in ways he did not expect.
